Hazi.ro: Cheap VPS in Romania! (2GB VPS for $5.95/mo)

cheap vps, cheapest vps, hazi, hazi.ro, kvm, romania September 14, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Welcome, Hazi!

Hazi is the brain child of three Romanian students (Florin, Radu, and Teodor), who have banded together to start a hosting company.  They’ve got some exception pricing:

  • Get a 2GB VPS with 30GB of space, 2GB of swap, and 5TB (!) of bandwidth for $5.95/mo. in Romania!

On the one hand, these are college students but on the other, they’re very upfront with who they are and what they’re offering, which is a good sign.  The LowEnd community is adventurous, so if you’re looking for a new provider at a great price, maybe you should give Hazi a spin.

Their WHOIS is public. They are registered in Romania. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Credit/Debit Card, Paysafecard, Bitcoin, Ethereum, USD Coin, Dogecoin, Litecoin, Dai, and Bitcoin Cash.

Here’s a little about Hazi in their own words:

“HFM S.R.L is running under three Romanian students of Faculty of Informatics, Iasi, Romania. All of us are classmates and each member has it’s own specialisation:
Florin – Commercial advices, Technical support
Radu – web designer, C++ master
Teodor – web designer, Level 1 Support”

Have you been a Hazi customer? Please share your experience in the comments below.

Now read more to see the offers!
